IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE RESOURCES TO NATIONAL, STATE, AND LOCAL PROGRAMS CREATING MOTIVATIONAL AND EDUCATIONAL OPPORTUNITIES FOR YOUTH AND FAMILIES THROUGHOUT THE STATE OF INDIANA AND SURROUNDING COMMUNITIES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PROVIDE RESOURCES TO NATIONAL, STATE, AND LOCAL PROGRAMS CREATING MOTIVATIONAL AND EDUCATIONAL OPPORTUNITIES FOR YOUTH AND FAMILIES THROUGHOUT THE STATE OF INDIANA AND SURROUNDING COMMUNITIES.
IRS990.Desc: PROVIDED AWARENESS AND SUPPORT FOR MENTAL HEALTH AWARENESS THROUGH "KICKING THE STIGMA" CAMPAIGN, SUPPORT FOR YOUTH FOOTBALL PROGRAMS, AND PARTNERED WITH LOCAL SCHOOLS TO BUILD PLAYGROUNDS.

IRS990ScheduleG.GamingManagerServicesProvTxt: PREPARED AND REVIEWED RECORDS FOR GAMING ACTIVITIES

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION CONSISTS OF BOTH DIRECTOR MEMBERS AND SUPPORTING MEMBERS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ANY VACANCY ON THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS MAY BE FILLED BY A MAJORITY VOTE OF THE REMAINING DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION PROVIDES A COPY OF THIS FORM 990 TO ALL MEMBERS OF ITS GOVERNING BODY BEFORE FILING THE FORM. THE RETURN IS ALSO REVIEWED BY THE CONTROLLER AND TREASURER PRIOR TO BEING FILED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH DIRECTOR, PRINCIPAL OFFICER AND MEMBER OF A COMMITTEE WITH GOVERNING BOARD DELEGATED POWERS SHALL SIGN A STATEMENT WHICH AFFIRMS SUCH PERSON HAS RECEIVED A COPY OF THE CONFLICTS OF INTEREST POLICY, READ AND UNDERSTANDS THE POLICY, HAS AGREE TO COMPLY WITH THE POLICY, AND UNDERSTANDS THE FOUNDATION IS CHARITABLE AND IN ORDER TO MAINTAIN ITS FEDERAL TAX EXEMPTION IT MUST ENGAGE PRIMARILY IN ACTIVITIES WHICH ACCOMPLISH ONE OR MORE OF ITS TAX EXEMPT PURPOSES. IN CONNECTION WITH ANY ACTUAL OR POSSIBLE CONFLICT OF INTEREST, AN INTERESTED PERSON MUST DISCLOSE THE EXISTENCE OF THE FINANCIAL INTEREST AND BE GIVEN THE OPPORTUNITY TO DISCLOSE ALL MATERIAL FACTS TO THE DIRECTORS AND MEMBERS OF COMMITTEES WITH GOVERNING BOARD DELEGATED POWERS CONSIDERING THE PROPOSED TRANSACTION OR ARRANGEMENT. AFTER DISCLOSURE OF THE FINANCIAL INTEREST AND ALL MATERIAL FACTS, AND AFTER ANY DISCUSSION WITH THE INTERESTED PERSON, HE/SHE SHALL LEAVE THE GOVERNING BOARD OR COMMITTEE MEETING WHILE THE DETERMINATION OF A CONFLICT OF INTEREST IS DISCUSSED AND VOTED UPON. THE REMAINING BOARD OR COMMITTEE MEMBERS SHALL DECIDE IF A CONFLICT OF INTEREST EXISTS. THIS PROCESS IS REVIEWED REGULARLY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC.
